text: George McGregor was a Scottish professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:People from Saltcoats Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Saltcoats Victoria F.C. players Category:St Mirren F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Benburb F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: George McGregor
